entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning late this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the morning and early afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
